definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
term of office/while holding a post

sentences.english: During this period, a large number of youngers participated in the movement and went abroad.
sentences.chinese: 在这期间大批青年远涉重洋，赴法留学。

sentences.english: During Hellenistic times, Greek women also started to artificially wave and curl their hair.
sentences.chinese: 在希腊化时代期间，希腊女人就已开始人为地卷发了。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the Fox will come down from the mountains and will metamorphose itself into a Wolf.
sentences.chinese: 期间，狐狸会下山，会把自己变成狼。

sentences.english: During the holiday, tens of hundreds of people enjoy themselves on Quancheng square.
sentences.chinese: 假日期间，许多人在泉城广场休闲。

sentences.english: He later said he had a liver transplant during this period.
sentences.chinese: 他稍后表示在病休期间接受了一次肝移植手术。

sentences.english: Sadly enough, the generator was all but forgotten during World War II.
sentences.chinese: 但不幸的是，这些机器在二战期间被完全遗忘废置。

sentences.english: Interning in college increases your chances of getting a job.
sentences.chinese: 在校期间实习将增加你找到工作的机会。

sentences.english: When you emperor of Manchoukuo, what rights did you have?
sentences.chinese: 你在当满洲国皇帝的期间，有什么权利吗？

sentences.english: Try to squeeze in the grocery trip in that intermediate time.
sentences.chinese: 尽量在此期间挤时间去购物。

sentences.english: In the knowledge that learned during school can say basically otiose .
sentences.chinese: 在校期间学了的知识，可以说基本上没有用的。

sentences.english: The Freedom Cup is a competition between New Zealand and South Africa during the Tri-Nations.
sentences.chinese: 自由杯是在三国赛期间新西兰和南非竞争的一个杯赛。

sentences.english: During the teaching force of the subtleties will be passed to students, respected by the disciples.
sentences.chinese: 教学期间将武之奥妙之处传给师生，受到弟子尊敬。

sentences.english: Will the Chinese Government allow this kind of protest during the May Day?
sentences.chinese: 中国政府是否允许“五一”期间发生这类抗议活动？

sentences.english: We were bombed out during the Anti-Japanese War.
sentences.chinese: 抗战期间我们被炸得无家可归。

sentences.english: He became acquainted with many well-known writers during her short stay there.
sentences.chinese: 她在那短暂逗留期间结识了许多名作家。

sentences.english: During the war, my family prayed every day for peace.
sentences.chinese: 在战争期间，我的家人每天祈祷，冀求和平。

definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
around/from beginning to end/all around/front and rear
once/already/ever (in the past)/former/previously/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
